original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kumbhassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena kumbhassa ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti yam vadesi katamam tam ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti
yathā mahā rāja kumbhaḥ sampuṇṇaḥ na saṇati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āgame adhigame pariyattiyaṁ sāmaññe pāramiṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena āgame adhigame pariyattiyam sāmaññe pārami

original: patvā na saṇitabbaṁ, na tena māno karaṇīyo, na dabbo dassetabbo, nihatamānena nihatadabbena
analyzed: na tena mānaḥ karaṇīyaḥ na dabbaḥ dassetabbaḥ nihata mānena nihata dabbena
bhavitabba ujukena a mukharena a vikatthinā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kumbhassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja kumbhassa ekam aṅgam
mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena sutta nipāte
